channel.title: black mesa is updating on steam
channel.description: is it supposed to be doing that?

item.title: black mesa is updating on steam
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
The current black mesa will never update because it’s just a mod. It’s not gonna turn into the steam version. Steam version will be separate from the current one. So yes, it’s probably just source sdk base.

Read full topic
item.source: black mesa is updating on steam

item.title: black mesa is updating on steam
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
It’s probably just the Steampipe update. Black Mesa isn’t updating, the Source SDK Base 2007 is.
